content: Xander's been learning at this workshop, refining his cultural sensitivity. We've seen progress, but there's still a gap in his understanding. We're adding more diverse data to his training now to help him grasp the world better.

Xander's policy playground is now as easy to navigate as your favorite app. We've streamlined the interface, but some users still need more help. We're beefing up the guides to make policy discussions as intuitive as a game night.
